Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class FaithTrack

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Observable<GameEvent>
it.polimi.ingsw.model.FaithTrack
public class FaithTrack
extends Observable<GameEvent>
This class represents the Faith Track of Maestri del Rinascimento board game. It is a part of the PersonalBoard where the player can move his faith marker. It is composed by 25 cells and 3 Vatican Report Sections.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private int faithMarker
    The position of the player on the track.
    private int passedSection
    The index of the last passed Vatican Report Section.
    private VaticanReportSection[] sections
    The three Vatican Report Sections forming the Faith Track.
    private int[] victoryPoints
    Each cell of the Faith Track is associated with some victory points, gained by the player when he reaches that cell.

    • activeVaticanReport

      public void activeVaticanReport​(Player triggerPlayer, int vatican_index)
      Actives a Vatican Report only if the Favor Tile associated with the pope space reached is still faced down. Notifies the Game of the activation.
      Parameters:
      triggerPlayer - the player who activated the vatican report.
      vatican_index - the index of the section where the vatican report has been activated.

    • setFavorTile

      public void setFavorTile​(int index, StateFavorTiles state)
      Sets the Favor Tile at the given index to the given state.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the Favor Tile to set.
      state - the state to set.

      Returns:

    • isPopeSpace

      public boolean isPopeSpace​(int vatican_index, int marker)
      Checks if the player has reached a pope space.
      Parameters:
      vatican_index - the index of the section where the player is.
      marker - the position of the player on the Faith Track.
      Returns:
      the check validity.

    • getPopeSpace
